definition: lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Our School stands on the ground of the Cheung Ching Estate among greeny hills and waters.
sentences.chinese: 我們的學校，迄立在青山綠水的長青邨。

sentences.english: Dalliance mountains in China, you can completely blend together with nature.
sentences.chinese: 在青山綠水中徜徉，你完全可與大自然交融在一起。

sentences.english: We have a beautiful campus surrounded by green hills and clear lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我們擁有青山綠水環繞的美麗的校園。

sentences.english: I'm going to take a rest, in green mountains and clear waters.
sentences.chinese: 我要休息一下，去青山綠水之間肆意行走。

sentences.english: Preserve the green mountains and clear rivers for posterity
sentences.chinese: 爲子孫後代留下青山綠水。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
(of a city etc) ablaze with lights
